channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: +++ title = “About Hugo” date = “2014-04-09” menu = “main” +++ Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?
